Description: There is no additional lane near the centre line of the road where one can travel on for say a couple of hundred metres before turning right to take the road into Gingin. Travelling north on the Brand Hwy one is often followed by a large truck which usually travel at the maximum speed permitted. When one slows down prior to turning right the truck behind is often very close .Often the motorist has to stop to allow a vehicle travelling south to pass before the turn right can be made.
almost hit the roof of our car travelling over this terrible section of Brand highway south of Gingin
